item-custom-info-trigger: *Click here* to set what has to be happening
item-custom-info-action: *Click here* to set what should happen
item-custom-info-material: *Click here* to change the display item
item-custom-info-name: *Click here* to change the name via chat
item-custom-trigger-get_item: item is clicked or picked up
item-custom-action-cancel: Prevent that the trigger will be executed
item-custom-action-command: Commands are executed for players via */execute as*.
Allowed commands can be set in plugin config.
The player doesn't need the *permission* to the commands.
Player aren't able to execute *plugin commands*.
item-custom-action-max_health: Modify the max health of players.
item-custom-action-max_health-offset: Choose how the max health should be changed
item-custom-action-spawn_entity: Spawn an entity with a specific type
item-custom-action-potion_effect: Add a potion effect to entities
item-custom-action-permanent_effect: Add a permanent potion effect to players.
Uses the settings of the permanent effect challenge.
item-custom-action-random_effect: Add a random potion effect to entities
item-custom-action-drop_random_item: Drop a random item from the inventory onto the floor
item-custom-action-remove_random_item: Remove a random item from the inventory
item-custom-action-swap_random_item: Swap two items in the inventory
item-custom-action-freeze: Uses the settings of the freeze challenge
item-custom-action-invert_health: Invert the current health of players
item-custom-action-water_mlg: All players have to do a water mlg to survive
item-custom-action-jnr: A random player has to a a jump and run
item-custom-action-win: The challenge will be won *by specific players*
item-custom-action-random_hotbar: The inventory is emptied and the player
gets a full hotbar of random items
item-custom-action-swap_mobs: Swap a mob with another of the same world
item-custom-setting-target-current: The action will be executed for the *current entity*
item-custom-setting-target-every_mob: The action will be executed for *every mob*
item-custom-setting-target-every_mob_exc: The action will be executed for *every mob*
The action will be executed for *every mob except players*
item-custom-setting-target-random_player: The action will be executed for a *random player*
item-custom-setting-target-every_player: The action will be executed for *every player*
item-custom-setting-target-current_playe: The action will be executed for the *active player*.
§7§oIf the current entity is not a player nothing will be happen
item-custom-setting-target-console: The action will be executed for the *console*
